channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DOGE says GSA saving $1M by converting decades-old information storage technology to digital records
item.description: DOGE on Friday said the General Services Administration is saving $1 million by converting magnetic tapes to permanent modern digital records.
